title: Electric field inside hollow metal sphere

content.prompt: The hollow metal sphere shown above is positively charged. Point C is the center of the sphere and point P is any other point within the sphere. Which of the following is true of the electric field at these points?

choices.label: It is zero at C, but at P it is not zero and is directed inward.
It is zero at C, but at P it is not zero and is directed outward.
It is zero at P, but at C it is not zero.
It is not zero at either point.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
